p: To further study the function of site 143 to the undifferentiated FAD2s in expression, the PfrFAD2-1 was chosen as an example to study. The activity of PfrFAD2-1 and PfrFAD2-1Y138I was analyzed, and the result showed their conversion rates were consistent ( p = 0.14). Hence, the mutation between I and Y in the 143 site might not work in the undifferentiated FAD2s, which might be specific in the diverged FAD2s. The spatial structure of GmaFAD2-1 was also predicted using the SWISS model ( https://www.swissmodel.expasy.org/). However, due to the lack of crystal structure only a partial spatial structure of GmaFAD2-1 was predicted based on the 4zyo.1 [ 34]; the results showed that the Y with a benzene ring in the catalytic center of FAD2 might influence the structure of the activity center.
